TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ActiveDirectoryConnectionProtection extends System.Enum

summary.span: Specifies the connection protection options supported by the class.

span.span: Specifies the connection protection options supported by the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列挙型は、間の通信をセキュリティで保護するために使用するプロトコルを設定するアプリケーションの構成ファイルで使用されて、オブジェクトと、Active Directory または Active Directory アプリケーション モードのサーバー。The enumeration is used in an application's configuration file to set the protocol used to secure communications between an object and an Active Directory or Active Directory Application Mode server. 列挙体に基づく接続の確立、プロバイダーのセキュリティの種類を示す、`connectionProtection`の属性、 [membership 要素 (ASP.NET 設定スキーマ)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)構成要素。The enumeration indicates the type of connection security the provider established based on the `connectionProtection` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) configuration element. `connectionProtection`属性は設定できますいずれかにのみ"None"または"Secure"です。The `connectionProtection` attribute can be set only to either "None" or "Secure".

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryConnectionProtection None = int32(0)

summary.span: No transport layer security is used.

span.span: No transport layer security is used.

summary.span: Explicit credentials for the Active Directory connection must be provided in the configuration file.

span.span: Explicit credentials for the Active Directory connection must be provided in the configuration file.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryConnectionProtection SignAndSeal = int32(2)

summary.span: The connection to the Active Directory server is secured by digitally signing and encrypting each packet sent to the server.

span.span: The connection to the Active Directory server is secured by digitally signing and encrypting each packet sent to the server.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryConnectionProtection Ssl = int32(1)

summary.span: An SSL connection is used to connect to the Active Directory server.

span.span: An SSL connection is used to connect to the Active Directory server.
